H0.text: Wind energy is the resource that could eventually be depleted by the increasing use of internal combustion engines.

H1.text: Petroleum is the resource that could eventually be depleted by the increasing use of internal combustion engines.

H2.text: Uranium is the resource that could eventually be depleted by the increasing use of internal combustion engines.

H3.text: Solar energy is the resource that could eventually be depleted by the increasing use of internal combustion engines.

A4.text: About 90 percent of vehicular fuel needs are met by oil.
